app.lem: Zucht er und lob ir wonet bey \
app.rdg: Grace, honor and praise are her domain;

app.rdg: Tof my free will, will no regret,

app.lem: bin ich verphlicht zw dienen ir \
app.rdg: I am bound to serve her.

app.lem: Sy hat fürwar das feinst geperd \
app.rdg: Truly, she has the finest bearing;

app.lem: beschwert und höchlich mert \ sich hertzlich klag und sentlich gir \
app.rdg: a heartful lament and yearning desire have afflicted me and grown immensely

app.lem: seyd ich nu waiß zůkünnftig nat \
app.rdg: Since I found out there was trouble ahead,

app.lem: kayn rat \ auff erd mich hellfen mag \
app.rdg: no earthly counsel can help me.

app.rdg: The days is here;

app.lem: er hör mein klag \
app.rdg: hear my lament

app.lem: die ich stätz trag \
app.rdg: which I must always bear;

app.lem: thů gnad mein glück ee ich verzag.

app.lem: Recht als ayn wild kayn vernunft hab \
app.rdg: Just as a wild animal has no reason,

app.lem: gar ab \
app.rdg: just as if

app.lem: mein schatz und hab durch schaydens gwalt verlassen wirt \
app.rdg: I were bereaved of my treasure and wealth by the power of separation.

app.lem: dardurch mein kranks und schwyrigs heetz \
app.rdg: Because of this, my sick and wounded heart fell,

app.lem: on scherrtz \ unsäglich schmertz \
app.rdg: in unspeakable anguish

app.lem: mit seüfftzen vil im ellendt fyrt \
app.rdg: and with a groan, into misery, I kid you not!

app.lem: ich glaub kain frewd sey mir beschert \
app.rdg: I don’t think I’ll be granted any joy,

app.lem: verkert \ sich nicht mein schmertzlich wee \
app.rdg: unless my anguished torment changes course;

app.lem: wie ichs nů dee \
app.rdg: however I turn,

app.lem: gee oder stee \
app.rdg: walk or stand,

app.lem: gleych wye der schnee \ ich armer bůb im layd vergee.

app.lem: Ich laß in reden was er will \
app.rdg: I’ll let him say what he wants;

app.lem: in still \
app.rdg: secretly

app.lem: mich trübt so vill \ sein hertzlich layd mer dan ich klag \
app.rdg: his heartfelt pain saddens me, more than I express:

app.lem: mir was vornye mein hertz so wunnd \
app.rdg: My heart has never felt so wounded.

app.lem: die stund \ ist mir wol kund \
app.rdg: I’m well aware of what the bell tolls for;

app.lem: mein schwere peyn dye ich stätz trag \
app.rdg: of the great pain which I must always endure.

app.lem: glück durch dein hillff not wurd gewend \ behend \
app.rdg: Fortune, with your help, trouble could be deftly averted,

app.lem: so ver er selber wult \
app.rdg: insofar as he wants it.

app.lem: mein gross unschult \

app.rdg: Help me, oh my fortune

app.lem: durch mein gedult \ wenden in hult \
app.rdg: to turn, with my patience

app.lem: hyllff schyr mein glück

app.rdg: my great innocence into favor;

app.lem: thue was ich sult.
app.rdg: to do what I ought to do.

app.lem: Schaffen nit vil ir süsse wort \
app.rdg: Her sweet words don’t achieve much;

app.lem: zů hort und ser betort \ ist in mir mein hertz můt und syn \
app.rdg: my heart, spirit and mind are too hardened and have been played the fool;

app.lem: ir gunst tet sich offt verkeren \
app.rdg: her favor often changed;

app.lem: eren \ alpot meren \ will ich ir pryß wo ich nur bin \
app.rdg: her favor often changed; I will honor and keep praising her, wherever I am and wherever I go;

app.lem: und far dahyn ellendiklich \ schayd ich \ in disem jamerstall \

app.lem: dy wellt ist hol \
app.rdg: The world is hollow

app.lem: und untrew vol \
app.rdg: and full of betrayal

app.lem: ich wayß nit wie ichs versten sol.
app.rdg: I don’t know how I’m supposed to understand it.

app.lem: Thüe was ich wil so ist mein gunst \
app.rdg: Whatever I do, my favor is in vain;

app.lem: umb sunst \ dye grosse prünst \ der trewen lieb myet mich schwerlich \
app.rdg: the great ardor of faithful love torments me grievously;

app.lem: mir gschicht unrecht bey meinem aydt \
app.rdg: I’m being wronged, I swear!

app.lem: mein zeyt \ on alle freyt \
app.rdg: I have to pass the time with no joy;

app.lem: vertreiben můß den lon hab ich \
app.rdg: that’s my reward.

app.lem: mein allte trew bedenck gsell pass \
app.rdg: Sweetheart, think hard about how faithful I have always been,

app.lem: und lass mich bleyben ewig dein \
app.rdg: and let me remain yours forevermore;

app.lem: in güet erschein \
app.rdg: come to me in good cheer,

app.lem: vertreib mein peyn \
app.rdg: take away my pain

app.lem: und laß mich sein \
app.rdg: and let me be

app.lem: bevolhen dyr erbarmb dich mein.
app.rdg: bound to you: have mercy on me!

app.lem: Ja fraw dein red mein hertz vast yebt \
app.rdg: Yes, my lady, your words move my heart deeply;

app.lem: nw liebt \und unmass tryebt \ dein tugend groß mich armen brůder \
app.rdg: now your virtue beguiles and [at the same time] saddens, me, poor brother that I am, without measure.

app.lem: du waist das ich an argen won \ lieb hon \
app.rdg: You know that I love you and trust you,

app.lem: dich hösten kron \ und stätz bewar dein zucht und er \
app.rdg: my dearest treasure, and always maintain your favor and grace:

app.lem: dan all mein frewd in ewr giet \
app.rdg: For all my joy lies in your goodness.

app.lem: ich pitt \
app.rdg: I ask

app.lem: verstet mich ewen recht \
app.rdg: and understand me right:

app.lem: ich bin gantz schlecht \
app.rdg: I'm being completely honest;

app.lem: darum an secht \
app.rdg: so look at me,

app.lem: getrewen knecht \
app.rdg: your faithful servant,

app.lem: und uns bayde nit weitter schwecht.
app.rdg: and don’t weaken us both anymore.

app.lem: Nicht lass mich gen dir verhetzen \ letzen \ auch nit setzen \
app.rdg: Don’t let me defy you or stand in your way,

app.lem: kan mich von dir kayns menschen list \
app.rdg: no human deception can take me away from you.

app.lem: ach werden glück erbarmb dich mein \
app.rdg: Oh, dear fortune, have mercy on me;

app.lem: vereyn solch schwere pein \
app.rdg: alleviate this grievous pain

app.lem: durch deine gůt als frumb du bist \
app.rdg: with your goodness, for you are gracious.

app.lem: o mein hertz aller liebster gsell \
app.rdg: Oh, my heart’s dearest companion,

app.lem: ich stell \
app.rdg: I place

app.lem: mein trost und hayl in dich \
app.rdg: I place my comfort and salvation in your hands;

app.lem: ich mayns treylich \ mein lieb an sich \ bit hertziklich \

app.rdg: I am yours for sure, believe me.

app.lem: Ach gsell nit glaub ir trew sich an \
app.rdg: Oh, my lad, don’t believe [the slanderer], see her faithfulness,

app.lem: ob schon \ sein gwonlich lon \

app.rdg: in case sorrowful love should give its usual reward,

app.lem: traurige lieb erzaygen thůt \

app.lem: drumb laß nit ab deyn gmůt hyn lenck \
app.rdg: don’t give up, set your mind to it,

app.lem: bedenck \
app.rdg: think about it,

app.lem: on not nicht krenck \ dich selber han ayn gůten můt \
app.rdg: don’t hurt yourself unnecessarily: Be in good cheer.

app.lem: der gleychen dw zart schöne fraw \
app.rdg: Likewise, you, gentle, beautiful lady,

app.lem: an schaw \ sein klag und schmertzlich peyn \
app.rdg: see his sorrow and grievous pain.

app.lem: den hertz verzeyn \
app.rdg: Lock your heart

app.lem: kein frömbden scheyn \ nit lass darein \
app.rdg: and don't let any strange pretence enter it.

app.lem: trew ist seltzam drumb hallt dich sein \
app.rdg: Loyalty is rare: therefore, stay with him.
